text: I believe that — yes — a custom module would currently be the only way to accomplish this in the DnD builder.

Unfortunately, for drag and drop emails, the answer is currently “no.” Dnd email templates and sections have to be rebuilt by hand if you wish to use them in another portal.

HTML/custom-coded templates _can_ be uploaded to design tools, but I’m assuming that’s not what you’re looking for. :sweat_smile:
